preferences.name: hideDebugUrls
preferences.title: Hide Debug URLs
preferences.label: Hide debug/crash commands
preferences.description: Hide potentially dangerous debug commands that can crash or hang the browser. These are intended for developers testing crash reporting and browser stability.

preferences.name: hideUntrustedUrls
preferences.title: Hide Untrusted URLs
preferences.label: Hide chrome-untrusted:// URLs
preferences.description: Hide chrome-untrusted:// URLs which run in isolated security contexts. These are advanced features that may cause unexpected behavior if you don't understand their purpose.

scripts.prepublishOnly:
echo "

It seems like you are trying to publish the Raycast extension to npm.

If you did intend to publish it to npm, remove the \`prepublishOnly\` script and rerun \`npm publish\` again.
If you wanted to publish it to the Raycast Store instead, use \`npm run publish\` instead.

" && exit 1
